lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good, all right, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree is still focused on the illusion that you stay within the range to maintain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as that begins to fade and the tree turns, on the very edge you can see running, lumbering out of the side of the darkness (stomping), the Laughing Hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high voice) You can stay on the perimeter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (swooshing) You all vanish back to the core of the Dynasty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is as close to a win as we were going to get, which is no one's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! No, we could've got fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were one roll away from getting that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't know how long it'd take him. I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He got it in one round!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All things considered this is as good as it could've went.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not as good as it could've fucking went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good as it could've went would've been us with the skull!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with what he's saying!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the best losing we could've had.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm okay with a good loss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was definitely a fucking loss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know what, we're not dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a short amount of time to make an impact and we lost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got 80 years to make our mark on this world and it's gone!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a halfling and we will work on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did still have Turn Undead and Blight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had a lot of spell slots left. We could have fought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had my auto Turn Undeads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why he fucking abandoned the Teleportation Circle and doomed us all to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For all those rounds that never fucking happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel pretty confident about my choices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your mistake was rolling really low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I'm just breaking a pencil into tiny shards over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're alive and we'll continue this in a couple weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it's frustrating, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mighty Nein hasn't had a victory in some time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep fucking shattering pieces over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone loves a loser. We're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys made some, some clever fucking things that avoided some serious challenges here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we had gotten here before them, I deeply believe we could've pulled this off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if we got here before, but that just didn't happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should've swiped his shit before we even got here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the Laughing Hand and three hounds would've shown up and we would've died in one round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tune in next week for whatever the fuck that is going to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until then, we love you guys, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Goodnight.
